s: I work at CMH2 (Groveport, OH). Our facility is now going to 2 - 30 minute breaks for 10 hour shifts. Yes, Amazon works people to death!! They squeeze as much out of you as possible. It's not the greatest company to work for... But, the pay & benefits are good.
